Putaani Party (Kannada: ಪುಟಾಣಿ ಪಾರ್ಟಿ, English: The Kid Gang)

bụ ihe nkiri gbasara asụsụ Kannada 2009.  Ndị otu ụmụaka na-eme ihe nkiri, India mere, a gbara ihe nkiri a n'ime obodo a na-akpọ Honnapura nke dịdebere obodo Dharwad na South India.  Ihe nkiri a na-eji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na mpaghara, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị na-eme oge mbụ bụ ndị ọhụrụ na usoro ihe nkiri.  Ihe nkiri a nwere otu olumba Kannada nke mmadụ ole na ole na-asụ n'akụkụ ahụ nke India.
Ramchandra PN, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Film and Television Institute of India, Pune dere ma duzie ihe nkiri a
Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Suddha meriri ihe nkiri India kachasị mma na Osian's Cinefan Festival of Asian Films, New Delhi, n'afọ 2007
Putaani Party bụ ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ na nke izizi ya n'asụsụ Kannada.
Gram Panchayat (òtù na-achị ime obodo) n'ime ime obodo India na-eme ka ọrụ nke Makkala Samiti (Kọmitii Ụmụaka) - òtù njikọta ụmụaka nke ụmụaka n'onwe ha họpụtara.
Kọmitii ahụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka otu nrụgide n'ịgbalị ime ka ọchịchị obodo meghachi omume na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya dị iche iche ọ na-ewelite

N'ịbụ ndị onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere óbị mmekọ na-eduzi, ịkwụwa aka ọtọ na ịnọgidesi ike nke ụmụaka ahụ na-eme ka ọtụtụ ndị okenye nwee ọtụtụ nku, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-eji 'Makkala Samiti' maka mkpa ha.
Ihe sotere ya bụ egwuregwu nwamba na òké dị aghụghọ, na njedebe nke ụmụaka na-atụ anya ka a nụ olu ha.
Ihe nkiri a na-ekwu n'ụzọ aghụghọ banyere ikike ụmụaka nwere ịchị onwe ha na àgwà dị mwute anyị ndị okenye nwere n'okwu a dị.
Ihe nkiri a emeriela Swarna Kamal (Golden Lotus) maka 57th National Film Award for Best Children's Film n'afọ 2009 nke Gọọmenti India guzobere.
